TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MessageQueuePermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission

Docs.summary: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Intersect (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: A permission object to intersect with the current permission object. It must be of the same type as the current permission object.
Docs.summary: Returns a new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object.
Docs.returns: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object. This new permission object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

Docs.param: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship. This object must be of the same type as the current permission object.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object.
Docs.returns: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Union (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: A permission object to combine with the current permission object. It must be of the same type as the current permission object.
Docs.summary: Returns a new permission object that is the union of the current and specified permission objects.
Docs.returns: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.
